# Reway

Reway is a calm bookmarking workspace that turns messy links into a structured library. It helps teams and individuals capture links fast, organize them by groups, and move through collections with keyboard-first navigation.

## Key pages
- https://reway-app.vercel.app/ — landing page
- https://reway-app.vercel.app/login — sign in
- https://reway-app.vercel.app/dashboard — app dashboard (private)

## Product highlights
- Smart link extraction from pasted text (regex-based)
- Auto-enriched titles and previews
- Groups to keep research, inspiration, and projects separated
- Keyboard navigation for fast browsing and actions
- Flexible view modes: cards, list, and icons
- Chrome extension for instant capture and opening bookmark groups
- Duplicate detection with clearer actions (including allowing duplicates across different groups)
- Reduced-motion friendly UI with improved accessibility for icon-only actions
